document_data.mainbody:
Lhorils Alley was a small alley that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Lhorils Alley was located in the eastern section of Waterdeeps Castle Ward. It branched off of the southern end of Duirs Alley in between the Street of Bells and the Street of the Sword, connecting with Waterdeep Way.
The alley was named for a wizard who battled a tanarri here and perished. Her ghost was believed to haunt the alley as running footsteps could be heard at all times of the day.
* The Elfstone Tavern
* House of Velstrode
